/circle6 Th  e three following types of cleaning solutions are used during housekeeping at a health

Ensuring the Quality of Care
MODULE III
101
/lozenge6 Plain detergent and water: scrubbing with plain detergent and water easily removes 
dirt and organic material such as grease, oil and other matter.
/lozenge6 Disinfectant (0.5% chlorine solution): this is used to clean up spills
